# MarshalStream.DisposeAsync method

Asynchronously releases the unmanaged resources used by the [`MarshalStream`](../MarshalStream.md).

```csharp
public override ValueTask DisposeAsync()
```

## Return Value

A task which is completed when the asynchronous dispose operation completes.
